name: Chase Coley
description: Chase Coley is a construction worker, husband to a woman named Mary, and father of a child named Charlie. Chase suffered from stress due to the toxic environment caused by his manager Tom Selvig, despite him claiming that he is charitable. To help him, Tom gave Chase some military-grade implants to boost his work ethics, but barely did anything. Chase was later given aMilitech Centaur, which worried a fellow coworker, warning him to not use the exoskeleton and the other implants he was chipped with, or else he would break his spine. However, Chase never listened due to work pressure, which...
